name: Slice It 3D
description:
Slice It 3D is a fun and addictive game where you have you aim your ball just right in order to cut through the shape.

Slice the shapes perfectly so that the pieces will fall away. Use your multi-shot in order to cut even more of the shape at one!

How many shapes can you cut?

Slice It 3D features:
- Simple and fun gameplay
- Increasingly challenging levels
- Colorful graphics
